com.oracle.sfp.scripting.api

Interface ICrossoverArbitratorHelper


  • public interface ICrossoverArbitratorHelper

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getCurrentAwardYear()
      Gets the award year corresponding to the current alternative.
      int getUpcomingAwardYear()
      Gets the award year corresponding to the upcoming alternative.
      boolean hasDisbursedDisbursementsInCurrentAwardYear()
      Indicates if the student has disbursed disbursements associated to the current award year for the academic year and payment period currently evaluated.
      boolean hasDisbursedDisbursementsInUpcomingAwardYear()
      Indicates if the student has disbursed disbursements associated to the upcoming award year for the academic year and payment period currently evaluated.
      boolean hasPaymentPeriodLockedInCurrentAwardYear()
      Indicates if the student has locked disbursements associated to the current award year for the academic year and payment period currently evaluated.
      boolean hasPaymentPeriodLockedInUpcomingAwardYear()
      Indicates if the student has locked disbursements associated to the upcoming award year for the academic year and payment period currently evaluated.
      boolean isReEntryWithin180Days()
      Indicates if the student has reentered the program within 180 days and if the student reentered within the academic year currently evaluated.
      IScriptedCrossoverArbitratorResult useCurrentAlternative()
      Used in conjunction with a return statement to let the script know it should use the CURRENT alternative.
      IScriptedCrossoverArbitratorResult useDefaultAlternative()
      Used in conjunction with a return statement to let the script know it should use the DEFAULT alternative.
      IScriptedCrossoverArbitratorResult useUpcomingAlternative()
      Used in conjunction with a return statement to let the script know it should use the UPCOMING alternative.

    • Method Detail

      • useCurrentAlternative

        @Nonnull
IScriptedCrossoverArbitratorResult useCurrentAlternative()
        Used in conjunction with a return statement to let the script know it should use the CURRENT alternative. return helper.useCurrentAlternative();
        Returns:
        the CURRENT alternative selection.

      • useUpcomingAlternative

        @Nonnull
IScriptedCrossoverArbitratorResult useUpcomingAlternative()
        Used in conjunction with a return statement to let the script know it should use the UPCOMING alternative. return helper.useUpcomingAlternative();
        Returns:
        the UPCOMING alternative selection.

      • useDefaultAlternative

        @Nonnull
IScriptedCrossoverArbitratorResult useDefaultAlternative()
        Used in conjunction with a return statement to let the script know it should use the DEFAULT alternative. return helper.useDefaultAlternative();
        Returns:
        the DEFAULT alternative selection.

      • isReEntryWithin180Days

        boolean isReEntryWithin180Days()
        Indicates if the student has reentered the program within 180 days and if the student reentered within the academic year currently evaluated.
        Returns:
        true if the student has reentered the program within 180 days and if the student reentered within the academic year currently evaluated.

      • getCurrentAwardYear

        int getCurrentAwardYear()
        Gets the award year corresponding to the current alternative.
        Returns:
        the award year corresponding to the current alternative.

      • getUpcomingAwardYear

        int getUpcomingAwardYear()
        Gets the award year corresponding to the upcoming alternative.
        Returns:
        the award year corresponding to the upcoming alternative.

      • hasDisbursedDisbursementsInCurrentAwardYear

        boolean hasDisbursedDisbursementsInCurrentAwardYear()
        Indicates if the student has disbursed disbursements associated to the current award year for the academic year and payment period currently evaluated.
        Returns:
        true if the student has disbursed disbursements associated to the current award year for the academic year and payment period currently evaluated.

      • hasDisbursedDisbursementsInUpcomingAwardYear

        boolean hasDisbursedDisbursementsInUpcomingAwardYear()
        Indicates if the student has disbursed disbursements associated to the upcoming award year for the academic year and payment period currently evaluated.
        Returns:
        true if the student has disbursed disbursements associated to the upcoming award year for the academic year and payment period currently evaluated.

      • hasPaymentPeriodLockedInCurrentAwardYear

        boolean hasPaymentPeriodLockedInCurrentAwardYear()
        Indicates if the student has locked disbursements associated to the current award year for the academic year and payment period currently evaluated.
        Returns:
        true if the student has locked disbursements associated to the current award year for the academic year and payment period currently evaluated.

      • hasPaymentPeriodLockedInUpcomingAwardYear

        boolean hasPaymentPeriodLockedInUpcomingAwardYear()
        Indicates if the student has locked disbursements associated to the upcoming award year for the academic year and payment period currently evaluated.
        Returns:
        true if the student has locked disbursements associated to the upcoming award year for the academic year and payment period currently evaluated.
